00090     protected function generateJavascript( $sTargetSelector = null, $arOptions = null, $sInsertBeforeOptions = null )
00091     {
00092         //  Get the options...      
00093         $_arOptions = ( null != $arOptions ) ? $arOptions : $this->makePublicOptions();
00094         
00095         //  Jam something in front of options?
00096         if ( null != $sInsertBeforeOptions )
00097         {
00098             $_sOptions = $sInsertBeforeOptions;
00099             if ( ! empty( $_arOptions ) ) $_sOptions .= ", {$_arOptions}";
00100             $_arOptions = $_sOptions;
00101         }
00102
